languages.text: Каждому орудию соответствует свое действие атаки на панели внизу экрана. Кликните по иконке атаки, чтобы увидеть диапазон обстрела и спланировать наиболее удачное расположение корабля на поле боя.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.
languages.original_text: Каждому орудию соответствует свое действие атаки на панели внизу экрана. Кликните по иконке атаки, чтобы увидеть диапазон обстрела и спланировать наиболее удачное расположение корабля на поле боя.

traits.locale_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its firing arc and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its firing arc and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its firing arc and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

languages.text: 虚空舰的每种武器，在屏幕底部的武器面板中都有着各自的攻击动作。您可以点击攻击图标，查看{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}，考虑战场的哪个位置对您的舰船最有利。
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰的每种武器，在屏幕底部的武器面板中都有着各自的攻击动作。您可以点击攻击图标，查看{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}炮击弧线{/g}，考虑战场的哪个位置对您的舰船最有利。

languages.text: 船に搭載された武器には、画面下部のパネルにそれぞれ個別の攻撃アクションが表示される。攻撃アイコンをクリックすると{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}発射アーク{/g}が表示され、戦場のどの位置であれば自分の船が最も有利になるのかを検討できる。
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

traits.locale_text: 船に搭載された武器には、画面下部のパネルにそれぞれ個別の攻撃アクションが表示される。攻撃アイコンをクリックすると{g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}発射アーク{/g}が表示され、戦場のどの位置が自分の船に最も有利かを検討できる。

languages.text: Cada arma de la nave tiene una acción diferente en el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla. Haz clic en el icono de un ataque ver su {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de tiro{/g} y analiza desde qué posición del campo de batalla podrá sacar más ventaja tu nave.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

traits.locale_text: Cada arma de la nave tiene una acción diferente en el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla. Haz clic en el icono de un ataque ver su {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arco de tiro{/g} y analiza desde qué posición del campo de batalla podrá sacar más ventaja tu nave.

languages.text: Jede der Schiffswaffen hat eine eigene Angriffsaktion auf dem Feld am unteren Bildschirmrand. Du kannst auf das Symbol eines Angriffs klicken, um den {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} zu sehen und zu überlegen, welche Position auf dem Schlachtfeld für dein Schiff am vorteilhaftesten wäre.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

traits.locale_text: Jede der Schiffswaffen hat eine eigene Angriffsaktion auf dem Feld am unteren Bildschirmrand. Du kannst auf das Symbol eines Angriffs klicken, um den {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}Schusswinkel{/g} zu sehen und zu überlegen, welche Position auf dem Schlachtfeld für dein Schiff am vorteilhaftesten wäre.

languages.text: Chacune des armes du vaisseau possède une action d'attaque distincte affichée sur le panneau en bas de l'écran. Vous pouvez cliquer sur l'icône d'une attaque pour visualiser son {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} et déterminer la position la plus avantageuse pour votre vaisseau sur le champ de bataille.
languages.original_text: Each of the ship's weapons has a separate attack action on the panel at the bottom of the screen. You can click on an attack's icon to view its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g} and consider what position on the battlefield would be the most advantageous for your ship.

traits.locale_text: Chacune des armes du vaisseau possède une action d'attaque distincte présentée sur le panneau situé en bas de l'écran. Vous pouvez cliquer sur l'icône d'une attaque pour afficher son {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}arc de tir{/g} et déterminer la position la plus avantageuse pour votre vaisseau sur le champ de bataille.
